26.ara-name: كتاب الأشربة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Sulaiman bin Buraidah: From his father, that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "I had indeed forbidden you from using containers, but the container does not make anything lawful nor unlawful, rather every intoxicant is unlawful." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ أَنْ يُنْبَذَ فِي الظُّرُوفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related Permitting That Nabidh Be Prepared Ibn Containers
